first_translate: but...

hangle: 차라리 어둠의 존재 자체를 없앨 방법은 없는 건가요?
first_translate: is there no way  we can eliminate darkness itself instead?

hangle: 오, 클로비스 후작님과 똑같은 말씀을 하시는군요.
first_translate: that’s exactly what marquess clovis said as well.
do you know him?
this hill is steep.
of course I do.

hangle: 아카데미에 가장 많은 연구비를 후원해 주시는 분이죠.
first_translate: he's our biggest sponsor for research at the academy.
he understands how important this work is.
it makes us very grateful.
and aside from that,
I think he’s just amazing...!
okay...
sounds like she has a good impression of me.
wow...
to hear that he was working on his own all along...

hangle: 역시 아렌트는 의심스럽긴 해도 대단한 인물이긴 해.
first_translate: arendt may seem suspicious sometimes, but he really is incredible.
in fact,

hangle: 저희도 어둠을 없애는 걸 목표로 연구를 진행 중 입니다만…
first_translate: we’re also researching ways to get rid of darkness completely,
but so far, nothing seems to have worked out.
all we’ve found out is that magic powers, darkness, and your holiness’ divine power...

hangle: 전부 유기적인 관계가 있다는 걸 알아내기는 했지만요.
first_translate: are organically related.
divine power works against magical energy.

hangle: 그리고 마력은 근본적으로 어둠과 유사한 성질.
first_translate: magical energy shares similar properties with darkness.

hangle: 또한 마력과 마력석은 서로 상호작용을 하죠.
first_translate: on top of that, mana stones interact with each other too.

hangle: 그러니 그쪽을 연구하면 뭔가 답이 나올지도 몰라요.
first_translate: studying those might give us some answers.
you already knew about these things?

hangle: 관심 분야가 비슷한 분을 만나게 되어 기뻐요.
first_translate: I’m glad to meet someone interested in my field of study.
my name is jane. please call me by my first name.
fiona haelion.

hangle: 헤일론은 마물의 습격이 잦아 자연히 이쪽에 관심이 생겼답니다. 잘 부탁드려요.
first_translate: the frequent monster attacks near haeleon led me into studying this subject myself. nice meeting you.

hangle: 헤일론 영애, 이걸 안 물을 수가 없는데요.
first_translate: lady haelion, if I may ask,

hangle: 영애께서는 어둠이 최근에 활발해진 이유가 뭐라고 생각하시나요?
first_translate: what do you believe caused the recent increase in dark forces?
hm...
that’s a tough question.
even I am curious about that...

hangle: 이 세계의 사람들은 어둠을 자연재해와 비슷하게 생각한다.
first_translate: darkness is considered something akin to a natural disaster here.

hangle: 일 년에 한두 번 강한 태풍이 오면 일대가 엉망이 되어버리지만,
first_translate: a strong typhoon will destroy everything once or twice every year,

hangle: 죽은 땅도 긴 시간이 지나면 어느 정도 회복된다.
first_translate: but even barren lands recover after enough time passes.

hangle: 하지만 최근 어둠의 등장이 잦아져 다들 위기의식을 느낀 거겠지.
first_translate: recently though, people started panicking because darkness began appearing more frequently than before.

hangle: 제인처럼 어둠이 기승을 부리는 이유가 궁금한 사람이 많을 거다.
first_translate: there must be many others wondering why this is happening, just like jane.
some say...

hangle: 근래 어둠이 자주 나타나게 된 건
first_translate: ...the reason darkness appears often nowadays...
...is clearly due to god being angry.
...is clearly due to god being angry.

hangle: 듣자 하니 관련된 종교도 생겼다는 모양이에요.
first_translate: apparently, they've formed their own religion based off of this idea.
a whole new religion?!
your holiness, we’re now approaching the northern part of town.

hangle: 숲과 마을… 어느 쪽을 먼저 정화하는 게 좋을까요?
first_translate: where would you prefer to purify first: the forest or the village?
hmm...
let’s start with the forest then.
god’s wrath...
and a new religion...
did I write anything about this?
could it truly be...

hangle: 정말로 신이 화가 난 탓에 일어난 걸까?
first_translate: ...that god is behind all this?
no,

hangle: 애초에 신이란 건 있는지 없는지도 모르는걸.
first_translate: nobody knows whether gods exist anyway.
then...
if it wasn’t done by god,
could humans possibly be responsible?
hey, you.

hangle: 조사 끝나고 돌아올 때는 무언가 복잡한 얼굴이었다가,
first_translate: when you came back from investigating earlier, you looked troubled.
as soon as you saw me, you stared straight at me...
...and suddenly had that smirk on your face again.
so tell me, what happened?
was I smiling?

hangle: 똥개 중에서 가장 잘생긴 똥개라고 생각하니 그만.
first_translate: stop thinking you’re the best-looking mutt around.
it’s not much.
is there something on my face?
why are you laughing?
I'm surprised, that's all.

hangle: 겨울의 수호자라길래, 처음에는 몸집이 태산만 한 사람일 거라 생각했거든…
first_translate: at first, when I heard "winter guardian," I thought you'd be huge--
sorry I disappointed you.
disappointed?
you’re one-of-a-kind, aren’t y--?
your ladyship.

hangle: 어둠이 같은 곳에 두 번 올 수도 있나?
first_translate: can darkness appear in the same place twice?
r-run away!
darkness is coming!!
leave your belongings behind!
get on horseback and move quickly!

hangle: 엑스트라 기사들은 비전투 인원에게 최대한 붙는다!
first_translate: extra knights stay close to non-combatants!
yes, sir!
it’s moving toward us fast.
oh dear...
hey!
I brought horses over.
thanks!
where’s siegren?
he’s helping evacuate people up north.
tell him to watch himself if you see him later!
wait.
please don’t tell me you plan to stay here.
go take shelter in the woods right away.
don’t worry about me.
you need to go back yourself, gunther!
staying here could mean death.
you could actually die.

hangle: 위험한 상황에서 윗대가리가 가장 먼저 내빼면,
first_translate: if leaders run away during times of danger,
it only causes greater chaos among everyone else.
I apologize,

hangle: 공작한테 부탁을 받은 게 있어서 말이다.
first_translate: but I promised duke bernhart something.
“if my daughter runs foolishly towards her death,”
“I want you to save her no matter what happens.”
that’s what he told me.
attack whenever you wish.
I’ll win either way.
now,
don’t worry too much.
I'll make sure everyone gets home safely!
